recipe_name: Lemon and dill-marinated salmon with herb salad
author: Brian Turner
method: Put all the salmon ingredients into a bowl and stir to coat to salmon well. Cover with cling film and leave to  marinate for ten minutes. Slice thinly. To make the herb salad, put the herbs into a large bowl and squeeze over the lemon juice and olive oil. Mix until  the herbs are well coated. To serve, put the herb salad on a plate and top with the slices of marinated salmon.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz salmon fillet, skin removed,  1 tsp caster sugar,  ½ lemon, juice only,  small handful fresh dill, finely chopped,  drizzle olive oil,  small handful each fresh chives, parsley, basil, mint, chopped,  squeeze lemon juice,  1 tbsp extra virgin olive oil
